metadata.title: 5037-2 -- Firefox regression
metadata.description: USN-5037-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Firefox. The update introduced a regression that caused Firefox to repeatedly prompt for a password. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original advisory details:   Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were  tricked into opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could  potentially exploit these to cause a denial of service, obtain sensitive  information, trick a user into accepting unwanted permissions, or execute  arbitrary code.
